sentence.text: Their phosphorylation activity has also linked them to the development of neurodegenerative diseases like Alzheimer's disease, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis or spinocerebellar ataxia cardiac muscle tissue development 11.

The final analysis of all this information led us to propose peptidyl-serine phosphorylation as a new target for the treatment of neurodegenerative diseases and its selective inhibitors as potential effective drugs for the treatment of these severe unmet disorders
